channel.title: ~~~ my to do list (need major help) ~~~
channel.description:
1. make npc's fight back. (KQ already fights back no mater what so how do i make everything fight back like KQ. some npcs will hit you once the first time but them it will stop till it dies or u use a spec) 2. For some reasion there is only 2 staff icons. Mod and Admin. player rights 1 = mod, 2 = admin icon, 3 (owner) = admin icon. (why is this and how do i fix this!) 3. how to make it so only (x) amount of people can log in at 1 time. example if 50 players are online and player 51 tries to log in it will say "server is full please try again in 1 minute" 4. when you use spec on some weapons like dragon claws, godswords they hit 300's in pk. how do i change this? 5. how to make it so if you die killing npc you dont loose all stuff? 6. how to fix thieving timer. it takes 15 sec every steal! 7. if you have a full spec bar and you use ags spec it takes all spec away but if you have half spec and use ags spec it still works. how do i make it so if u have full spec it only takes half of spec bar?
~~ I CAN CONNECT THROUGH TEAMVIEWER IF THAT WILL HELP ~~
Thanks! B15

item.title: ~~~ my to do list (need major help) ~~~
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

wow i wish i could rep++ you guys have helped me so much! if any 1 has an easier way of doing this or connecting through teamviewer that would be extremely fantastic! thanks B15

Posted on: January 09, 2010, 03:49:00 pm
Quote

  1. make npc’s fight back. (KQ already fights back no mater what so how do i make everything fight back like KQ. some npcs will hit you once the first time but them it will stop till it dies or u use a spec)

Thats NPC aggression
public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) { //in playerhandeller.java

ok well i looked in playerhandeller.java and saw NOTHING like “npcGetsAnnoyed” there is not even the word npc
so where else could i find this?
Thanks
B15

I meant npchandeller.java im sorry i was being plain ignorant shifty


i looked in there its not there! is it possible cow for you to access my computer through tamviewer to help me ?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

  1. make npc’s fight back. (KQ already fights back no mater what so how do i make everything fight back like KQ. some npcs will hit you once the first time but them it will stop till it dies or u use a spec)

Thats NPC aggression
public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) { //in playerhandeller.java

  1. For some reasion there is only 2 staff icons. Mod and Admin. player rights 1 = mod, 2 = admin icon, 3 (owner) = admin icon. (why is this and how do i fix this!)

look for bluurs tut

  1. how to make it so only (x) amount of people can log in at 1 time. example if 50 players are online and player 51 tries to log in it will say “server is full please try again in 1 minute”

Look in player / playerhandeller
public static final int maxPlayers = ####;
4. when you use spec on some weapons like dragon claws, godswords they hit 300’s in pk. how do i change this?

Look for the dclaws spec and change the amount

  1. how to make it so if you die killing npc you dont loose all stuff?

change it under logout

  1. how to fix thieving timer. it takes 15 sec every steal!

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
actionInterval = 4000; // change this or remove
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(emote);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sM(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}

Look for you steal; from the… then change the timer from 15 to whatever

  1. if you have a full spec bar and you use ags spec it takes all spec away but if you have half spec and use ags spec it still works. how do i make it so if u have full spec it only takes half of spec bar?

special edit aswell. somthin like specneeded

~~ I CAN CONNECT THROUGH TEAMVIEWER IF THAT WILL HELP ~~

Thanks!
B15
